title: I CANT LOGIN HELP PLZ I FAN
body:
I can't login, its not RADS error
Login Error 
The login server did not respond. You may have a connection issue that is not related to the League of Legends server. See our blah blah blah 
i am connected to the internet and I've tried the ipconfig /flushdns and the adapter settings with the 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4
still cant connect plz rito gaems i fan
